https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/gqKHMgY9hROEnUuS8xjla3DxQ9I.jpg Private Detective Kiyoshi Mitarai and Miyuki Ogawa arrive in Fukuyama, Hiroshima Prefecture. They are interested in a case which involves discovered bodies. The bodies were found drifting in the Seto Inland Sea, where the currents repeat every 6 hours. Detective Mitarai's Casebook: The Clockwork Current
